title: Setup shadcn/ui components
description:
Install and configure shadcn/ui for minimal UI.

## Installation
```bash
npx shadcn@latest init
npx shadcn@latest add button card badge alert dialog
```

## Components needed
- Button (approve/reject actions)
- Card (recommendation cards)
- Badge (status indicators)
- Alert (success/error messages)
- Dialog (confirmation modals)
